title: FRBR - Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records
description: Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records namespace

elementSets.title: FRAD model
elementSets.description: This is the element set of native RDF classes and properties described in the Functional Requirements for Authority Data model. The model also uses elements previously described in the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR) entity-relationship model.

elementSets.title: FRBRer model
elementSets.description: This is the element set of native RDF classes and properties described in the current text (Feb 2009) of the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR) entity-relationship model.

elementSets.title: FRBRoo model
elementSets.description: Element set of the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records object-oriented extension to the the CIDOC Conceptual Reference Model (CRM)

elementSets.title: FRSAD model
elementSets.description: This is the element set of native RDF classes and properties described in the Functional Requirements for Subject Authority Data model. The model also uses elements previously described in the Functional Requirements for Bibliographic Records (FRBR) entity-relationship model.

elementSets.title: FRBRer User Tasks
elementSets.description: Based on the current text, Feb 2009.

vocabularies.title: FRBRer User Tasks
vocabularies.description: Based on the current text, Feb 2009.
